TextEng: Sorry, but I can't chat right now. There's only a few of us left after that attack and the mayor wants us on double-duty... just in case.
Text: 미안하지만 지금은 얘기할 수 없어. 그 습격 후로 남은 경비가 몇 명 없어서 촌장이 만일에 대비해 이중 근무를 시키고 있거든.

TextEng: It might be safer if you went back to the school. There's only a few of us guards left right now to watch for any more attacks.
Text: 학교로 돌아가는 게 더 안전할 거야. 지금은 추가 습격에 대비할 경비가 몇 명 안 남았거든.

TextEng: You be careful, <FirstName>. There's no way to be sure all the kobolds are gone, and more could arrive.
Text: 조심해, <FirstName>. 코볼트가 전부 사라졌는지 확신할 수 없고, 더 올 수도 있어.

TextEng: <FirstName>? Is everything alright at the school? How is Drogan doing?
Text: <FirstName>? 학교는 괜찮아? 드로건은 어때?

TextEng: What are you doing here? I'm watching you, <FirstName>, just so you know.
Text: 여기서 뭐 하는 거야? 지켜보고 있으니까 알아둬, <FirstName>.

TextEng: Shouldn't you be back at your school? Drogan's there, isn't he? How is he doing?
Text: 학교로 돌아가야 하는 거 아냐? 드로건이 거기 있잖아? 어떻게 지내?

TextEng: I don't want any trouble out of you, <FirstName>. We've got enough problems in Hilltop right now.
Text: 너 때문에 문제 생기는 건 싫어, <FirstName>. 힐탑에 지금 문제가 충분히 많거든.

TextEng: Eh? Err... no, not this second. I have to watch for the reinforcements to arrive from Silverymoon. How about you? Everything okay with Drogan?
Text: 응? 어... 아니, 지금은 안 돼. 실버리문에서 오는 지원군을 기다려야 해. 너는 어때? 드로건은 괜찮아?

TextEng: And more than any of us need right now. There were plenty of people hurt by the kobolds, not that you'd care.
Text: 지금 우리한테 필요한 건 훨씬 더 많아. 코볼트 때문에 다친 사람이 많은데, 네가 신경이나 쓰겠냐만.

TextEng: Hmph. I don't know what Drogan sees in you. Well, do what you like. I have other things to worry about.
Text: 흥. 드로건이 너한테서 뭘 보는지 모르겠네. 뭐, 하고 싶은 대로 해. 난 걱정할 게 더 있거든.

TextEng: Oh? Everything okay at the school? Drogan is alright?
Text: 오? 학교는 괜찮아? 드로건은 무사해?

TextEng: I've heard enough about your exploits, <FirstName>. Just watch it, that's all.
Text: 네 행적에 대해 많이 들었어, <FirstName>. 그냥 조심해, 그게 다야.

TextEng: Well... maybe I'm being a bit harsh. I've just heard stories about you.
Text: 글쎄... 내가 좀 심하게 굴었나. 네 얘기를 들었거든.

TextEng: It's good to see you, <FirstName>. Something I can help you with?
Text: 만나서 반가워, <FirstName>. 도와줄 일이 있어?

TextEng: You be careful there, <FirstName>. We're not certain all the kobolds are gone from Hilltop just yet.
Text: 조심해, <FirstName>. 힐탑에서 코볼트가 전부 사라졌는지 아직 확실하지 않아.

TextEng: It's good to see that you're okay, <FirstName>. We were worried about you and Drogan up at the school. How is Drogan doing?
Text: 무사해서 다행이야, <FirstName>. 학교에 있는 너와 드로건이 걱정됐어. 드로건은 어때?

TextEng: Oh. I, ah... hope the old dwarf is alright, anyway. Those kobolds took us by surprise.
Text: 아. 나, 어... 어쨌든 그 늙은 드워프가 괜찮으면 좋겠네. 코볼트 놈들이 기습했거든.

TextEng: Something I can help you with?
Text: 도와줄 일이 있어?

TextEng: Be careful.
Text: 조심해.

TextEng: Farghan's in his shop across from the tavern. But what am I saying? Of course you know where his shop is.
Text: 파르간은 여관 건너편 가게에 있어. 근데 내가 왜 이러지? 당연히 가게가 어딘지 알잖아.

TextEng: Not personally, no. Fiona's in her smithy, however... I'm sure she can supply you whatever equipment you need at a decent price.
Text: 개인적으로는 없어. 하지만 피오나가 대장간에 있어... 적당한 가격에 필요한 장비를 뭐든 구해줄 수 있을 거야.

TextEng: I can't. The mayor wants the few of us that are left watching out for any new attacks. When we get reinforcements from Silverymoon, we'll do a house-to-house search.
Text: 안 돼. 촌장이 남은 우리 몇 명을 새로운 습격에 대비시키고 있거든. 실버리문에서 지원군이 오면 집집이 수색할 거야.

TextEng: Yes. We've already sent out a messenger to them, asking for help. Hopefully they weren't attacked as well.
Text: 응. 이미 전령을 보내서 도움을 요청했어. 그쪽도 공격받지 않았으면 좋겠네.

TextEng: The ones that ran away? They went south, by way of the town gate. You intend on chasing after them? If so, they've got quite a head start on you.
Text: 도망친 놈들? 마을 문 쪽으로 남쪽으로 갔어. 뒤쫓을 생각이야? 그렇다면 꽤 앞서 있을 거야.

TextEng: So they must have killed her right after they escaped. That's a sad, sad shame. Thank you for telling me... I'll let everyone know.
Text: 그럼 탈출하자마자 그녀를 죽인 거네. 정말 안타까운 일이야. 알려줘서 고마워... 모두에게 전할게.

TextEng: They did? But... I thought Lodar reported that he had everything under control there, short of a stand-off with a few kobolds in the kitchen.
Text: 그랬어? 하지만... 로다르가 부엌에서 코볼트 몇 마리와 대치하는 것 빼고는 다 통제했다고 보고하지 않았어?

TextEng: Blast! The mayor should have let us go and help those poor souls. Ahhh, well... thank you for bringing me the news, <FirstName>, bad as it is.
Text: 젠장! 촌장이 우리를 보내서 그 불쌍한 사람들을 도왔어야 해. 아아, 뭐... 소식 전해줘서 고마워, <FirstName>, 나쁜 소식이지만.

TextEng: Well, you might want to talk to Haniah over at the town hall. I heard the mayor's so drunk he can barely stand... so she's got her hands full, I bet.
Text: 글쎄, 마을 회관에 있는 하니아와 얘기해 보는 게 좋을 거야. 촌장이 너무 취해서 제대로 서지도 못한다던데... 그녀가 정신없이 바쁠 거야.

TextEng: Beyond that, if you could check around to make sure the kobolds aren't still bothering the locals, we'd appreciate it.
Text: 그 외에도 코볼트들이 아직 주민들을 괴롭히고 있는지 확인해 줄 수 있으면 고맙겠어.

TextEng: I'd gladly do that myself, but as long as we're this short-handed none of us can spare the time from keeping watch before help arrives.
Text: 기꺼이 내가 직접 하겠지만 이렇게 인원이 부족하면 지원이 올 때까지 감시에서 손 뗄 수가 없어.

TextEng: That's a relief. It's always been a point of pride amongst the people here that we have our own resident wizard, you know.
Text: 다행이네. 여기 사람들 사이에서 우리 마을에 마법사가 있다는 게 항상 자랑거리였거든.

TextEng: Damnable reptiles! Took us by surprise, they did. I hope Drogan recovers. If he died, that would be a real loss for all of us.
Text: 빌어먹을 파충류 놈들! 기습당했어. 드로건이 회복하면 좋겠어. 돌아가시면 우리 모두에게 큰 손실이야.

TextEng: Poisoned? Then you'd best get to Farghan's as soon as possible. He was in his shop the last I saw.
Text: 독에 당했다고? 그럼 빨리 파르간한테 가는 게 좋겠어. 마지막으로 봤을 때 가게에 있었어.

TextEng: That's good to hear. Thank you for letting me know, I'll pass it on.
Text: 다행이네. 알려줘서 고마워, 전해줄게.

TextEng: I wish we could have. We were taken by surprise and had our own battles to fight. We lost several men, I'm afraid to say.
Text: 그러고 싶었어. 기습당해서 우리도 싸워야 했거든. 안타깝게도 몇 명을 잃었어.

TextEng: I can't say that killing Piper was the right thing to do, but I guess it's on your conscience now, isn't it?
Text: 파이퍼를 죽인 게 옳은 일이라고는 못 하겠지만 이제 네 양심에 달린 일이잖아, 안 그래?

TextEng: So you killed Piper, did you, <FirstName>? I can't say it wasn't coming for him, all things considered.
Text: 그래서 파이퍼를 죽였구나, <FirstName>? 뭐, 자업자득이라면 자업자득이지.

TextEng: I cannot believe that Blumberg is burnt to the ground. I sure am glad we were better defended. You did a good thing, rescuing those refugees.
Text: 블럼버그가 잿더미가 됐다니 믿을 수가 없어. 우리가 더 잘 방어된 게 다행이야. 피난민들을 구출한 건 잘한 일이야.

TextEng: Hilltop Guard
Text: 힐탑 경비병
